title: Drawing, Design for Mahogany Sideboard with Neo-Classical Motifs, January 6, 1902
title_raw: Design for Mahogany Sideboard with Neo-Classical Motifs
medium: Pen and black ink, graphite on thin cream paper
inscribed: Inscribed in pen and black ink, lower right corner: Sideboard / of / Mahogany, and in graphite across lower edge: 5'-6" / Mahogany inlay, and: [inverted "V"] X V X S [all underlined]
creditline: Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society
description: Sideboard with four straight tapering legs (the front two with fluted tops) and semi-circular front - flat in middle portion - with two horizontal drawers with "C"-shaped handles; neo-classical motifs on rounded front corners and center back; upper shelf raised on scroll-shaped volutes.

participants.person_name: The Lake St. Louis Historical Society

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Design for Mahogany Sideboard with Neo-Classical Motifs, January 6, 1902. Pen and black ink, graphite on thin cream paper. 
Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society. 2000-69-24
